channel.title: Can anyone play guitar?
channel.description: I can personally, i have been practicing for about 3-5 years on a electric and now im learing acoustic, anyone else play guitar?

item.title: Can anyone play guitar?
item.dc:creator: @I_Samn_I I Samn I
item.description:
@I_Samn_I wrote:

i started but got bored so went out side (by that went out, like skating).

Read full topic

item.title: Can anyone play guitar?
item.dc:creator: @novalye Novalye
item.description:
@novalye wrote:

[quote=“Unhandled, post:25, topic:183384”]I find it hard to play because I’m used to playing along with real songs, with a real guitar. So I can never keep time properly. Of course, trying it in expert mode doesn’t seem to help.

I’ve been playing guitar for two years, and I can play the first half of Canon Rock, by JerryC/Funtwo. Along with plenty of other metal/classic songs.[/quote]
Guitar sounds fun, I should try some time.

Read full topic

item.title: Can anyone play guitar?
item.dc:creator: @Unhandled Unhandled
item.description:
@Unhandled wrote:

I find it hard to play because I’m used to playing along with real songs, with a real guitar. So I can never keep time properly. Of course, trying it in expert mode doesn’t seem to help.

I’ve been playing guitar for two years, and I can play the first half of Canon Rock, by JerryC/Funtwo. Along with plenty of other metal/classic songs.

Read full topic

item.title: Can anyone play guitar?
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

This thread is going off-topic, but why is guitar hero for fags?

Are war games for fags as well, just because you could go out and do the real thing instead?

Me and all my friends play guitar hero. There’s nothing wrong with it. Like I said, it’s not just for rockstar-wannabe’s. It’s a fun and challenging game.

Read full topic

item.title: Can anyone play guitar?
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

[quote=“novalye, post:16, topic:183384”][quote author=jme_009 link=topic=245061.msg2071701#msg2071701 date=1203747008]
I don’t play guitar. I can strum some simple chords on an acoustic, but thats all

Guitar Hero is for fags.

Guitar hero is fun. It’s very challenging. You don’t have to be a rock-star wannabe to enjoy the game.

they say the guitar is the instrument of love, i think so too.
i can play parts of songs, like the beggining of Killswitch Engage - My Curse, Bullets and octane - Pirates, Get ready, get set, dont go by Billy Ray Cyrus, and finally part of Stairway to heaven

who likes love when theres drugs

Who likes drugs when there is life?

Why not have both?
[/quote]
Because drugs are for low life give ups.[/quote]

Is that what mommy and daddy told you?

Read full topic
